{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC2655W |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/20/2001 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Eumitcom |manuf_model=WA3001A |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=LLM0102WA3001A |ic_id=3732104214A317 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=AT76C510 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=AT76C510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=LSI |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=WLAN |default_ssid_regex=^WLAN$ |default_ip=192.168.0.254 |default_user= |default_pass=MiniAP |oui=00:04:E2 |oui_eth=00:04:E2 }} ''EZ Connect 11Mbps Wireless Access Point''
[http://ec1.images-amazon.com/media/i3d/01/A/man-migrate/MANUAL000009457.pdf Manual] [http://www.seattlewireless.net/Wap11Hack Wap11Hack on SeattleWireless]
[http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/index.html On the HRI hardware table] The AP is manageable via the included SNMP management utility. The default password for the device is '''MiniAP'''. Per the manual, the default SSID is '''WLAN'''.
